description: This notification is generated when a physical or logical interface changes its status
in a particular link-state tracking group.
A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: This object specifies the status of a physical or logical interface.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-LINK-STATE-TRACKING-MIB::bsLstInterfaceStatus

description: The link-state tracking group id.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-LINK-STATE-TRACKING-MIB::bsLstGroupIndex

description: This notification is generated when the operational status of a link-state tracking group
changes due to an interface status change. For example, when the last interface of an
link-state tracking group becomes down, the operational status of the group changes to down.
A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: This object specifies the status of a physical or logical interface.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-LINK-STATE-TRACKING-MIB::bsLstInterfaceStatus

description: This object specifies the operational status of this group instance.
When this link-state tracking group is disabled, the value of this object
must be 'notConfigured(3)'.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-LINK-STATE-TRACKING-MIB::bsLstGroupOperState
